Courtesy of Princeton Blue Mountain collection

On the basis of expressive style and abstracted elements contributing to a sense of rhythm across the painting’s surface, the watercolor painting shown can be attributed to

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
